releases.title: Claude Opus 4.6 Released
releases.description: Anthropic's most capable model yet. Opus 4.6 delivers major improvements in reasoning, coding, and multi-step tasks. Available via API and Claude.ai.

releases.title: Claude Code CLI -- AI-Powered Terminal Agent
releases.description: Anthropic's official CLI tool that brings Claude directly into your terminal. Autonomous coding agent with file editing, git, and shell capabilities.

releases.title: Claude Sonnet 4.5 Released
releases.description: Anthropic's Sonnet 4.5 brings hybrid extended thinking, improved coding, and better agentic tool use at a balanced cost-performance point.

releases.title: OpenAI Codex -- Autonomous Coding Agent
releases.description: OpenAI's cloud-based coding agent. Runs in a sandboxed environment, handles multi-file tasks, writes tests, and creates PRs autonomously.

releases.title: GPT-4.1 Series Released
releases.description: OpenAI's GPT-4.1, GPT-4.1 mini, and GPT-4.1 nano models. Optimized for coding, instruction following, and long-context tasks up to 1M tokens.

releases.title: GPT-4o Released -- Omni Model
releases.description: OpenAI's multimodal model unifying text, vision, and audio in a single model. 2x faster and 50% cheaper than GPT-4 Turbo.

releases.title: Gemini 2.5 Pro Released
releases.description: Google's most capable thinking model. Excels at reasoning, coding, math, and science with native thinking capabilities.

releases.title: Gemini 2.5 Flash Released
releases.description: Google's fastest thinking model. Excellent performance-to-cost ratio with native tool use and thinking capabilities.

releases.title: Kimi k1.5 -- Moonshot AI Reasoning Model
releases.description: Moonshot AI's reasoning model rivaling o1 on math and coding benchmarks. Uses reinforcement learning for long-form chain-of-thought reasoning.

releases.title: DeepSeek V3 & R1 Released
releases.description: DeepSeek's open-source V3 model and R1 reasoning model. Competitive with frontier models at a fraction of the training cost. Fully open weights.

releases.title: Llama 4 Scout & Maverick Released
releases.description: Meta's Llama 4 family: Scout (17B active params, 16 experts, 10M context) and Maverick (17B active, 128 experts). Natively multimodal with industry-leading performance.

releases.title: Mistral Large 2 Released
releases.description: Mistral's 123B parameter flagship model. Strong coding, math, and multilingual capabilities with 128k context window.

releases.title: Grok 3 Released by xAI
releases.description: xAI's Grok 3 with reasoning capabilities. Trained on Colossus, one of the world's largest GPU clusters. Available on X platform.

releases.title: Cursor -- AI Code Editor
releases.description: AI-first code editor built on VS Code. Features inline editing, multi-file context, and autonomous coding with Claude and GPT models.

releases.title: Windsurf Editor by Codeium
releases.description: AI-powered IDE with Cascade, an agentic coding assistant that understands your entire codebase and makes multi-file changes.

releases.title: GitHub Copilot Agent Mode
releases.description: GitHub Copilot gains autonomous agent capabilities. Can plan, execute multi-step tasks, run terminal commands, and iterate on code.

releases.title: Sora -- OpenAI Video Generation
releases.description: OpenAI's text-to-video model capable of generating realistic videos up to a minute long from text prompts.

releases.title: Stable Diffusion 3.5 Released
releases.description: Stability AI's latest image generation model family with improved prompt adherence, typography, and photorealism.

releases.title: Perplexity Sonar -- Real-Time AI Search
releases.description: AI-powered search engine providing cited, real-time answers. Sonar API enables developers to build search-augmented AI applications.

releases.title: Ollama -- Run LLMs Locally
releases.description: Run Llama, Mistral, Gemma, and other open-source models locally on your machine. Simple CLI interface with model management.

releases.title: Qwen 2.5 Released by Alibaba
releases.description: Alibaba's open-source Qwen 2.5 family: 0.5B to 72B params. Strong multilingual, coding, and math capabilities. Apache 2.0 license.

releases.title: Microsoft Phi-4 Released
releases.description: Microsoft's small language model (14B params) that punches above its weight. Excels at reasoning and STEM tasks, rivaling much larger models.

releases.title: Flux.1 -- Black Forest Labs Image Model
releases.description: Open-source text-to-image model rivaling DALL-E 3 and Midjourney. Available in Pro, Dev, and Schnell variants.

releases.title: v0 by Vercel -- AI UI Generator
releases.description: AI-powered UI generation tool. Describe a component and get production-ready React/Tailwind code instantly.

releases.title: Replit Agent -- Build Full Apps with AI
releases.description: Replit's autonomous AI agent builds and deploys full-stack applications from natural language descriptions.

releases.title: vLLM 0.7 -- High-Throughput LLM Serving
releases.description: Major vLLM release with V1 architecture: 1.7x throughput improvement, disaggregated prefill, multi-node tensor parallelism, and improved prefix caching.

releases.title: SGLang v0.4 -- Fast LLM Inference Engine
releases.description: SGLang inference engine with RadixAttention, speculative decoding, structured generation, and multi-modal support. Zero-overhead batch scheduling.

releases.title: TensorRT-LLM -- NVIDIA LLM Optimization
releases.description: NVIDIA's high-performance inference library for LLMs. In-flight batching, paged KV cache, FP8/INT4 quantization, and multi-GPU tensor parallelism.
